Breakfast was tasty and good.  Scrambled eggs, oven vegetables, bacon and chicken fillet and beans were served as a hot dish.  Various breads, yoghurts, cold cuts.  Of course coffee, tea and fresh juices.  etc. We went to breakfast at about 8 o'clock, and it was not busy.

The room was good, quite small as usual in Paris hotels.  The bed was good for sleeping.  The room was cleaned every day.  Overall, the atmosphere was cozy.  I can warmly recommend the hotel.
